ma dakina paridi,pashchath ’83 juli yugayedi wama kala yuthuwa thibune janawargika gataluwata wisandumak sewima sandaha kapawana atharama,ee ekama wara nidahasa,prajathanthrawadaya saha samaja sadharanaya wenuwen karana aragalayada ath nohara karagena yama yayi sithami.deshapalanaya yanu pawathina thathwaya wenas kirima sandaha sakriya wima yi.balahathkaraya yodaganimen mepita,deshapalanayenma wenas kala nohaki wanne mathawadaya nowa pawathna samaja thathwayan yayi sithami.denalada samayaka samajayaka mathawadi adhinishchayawimak ehi deshapalanaye awasana iranama thindu karannak lesa bharagatha yuthu nowe.mema adahasata aacharya gunasinha da pasu kaleka elambaunu bawa mama kiyawa aththemi.

mekata kalayak gathawenawa , saksharathawaya adu , pawul salasum krama kriyathmaka nowena ratak dadas gala darudrathawayen goda ganna ba , indiyawe duppath minissu eka denna hari ee ken goda enne oya samajawadin irisiya karana dhanapathiyange aayojana , laba shramaya wenuwen , welanda pola wenuwen aapu aayojana nisa , ee awasthawa nathuwa hitiya nam ambanila , rathan tatala witharak neweyi ee minissu upaddapu rakiyawal nisa narawalen goda aapu laksha ganak minissuth ada inna thana na .

oya athare podi podi widya sankalpayakuth thiyanawa.payasi rajathuma - pas paw karana aya nirayata yanawanam nirayata giya kiyala awith kiyanne nahane?kumara kashyapa maha rahathan wahanse - marana daduwama niyama wechcha kenek wadakayata kiwwoth mage nayanta kiyala ennam kiyala yanna denawada?payasi rajathuma - marunata passe diwya loke yana aya awith kiyanne nahane ehe wisthara?kumara kashyapa maha rahathan wahanse - asuchi walaka watila hiti manussayek suwanda panin nahawa suwanda ganwa sukhopa bogi widihata inna salassuwoth ohu ho aya nawatha asuchi walata enawada?payasi rajathuma - karana lada kusala akusala karmayanhi pala prathiwipaka kawurath awith kiyanne nahane?kumara kashyapa maha rahathan wahanse - manushya loke warsha siyak thawthisawe wasi dewiyange ek rayak ha ek dawalak nam awith kiyanna puluwanda ehe wisthara?payasi rajathuma - kawuda kiwwe wasi dewiyange ek rayak ha dawalak mehe awurudu siyak kiyala?kumara kashyapa maha rahathan wahanse - andha manussayek kiwwoth irayi handayi naha kiyala?
